message_1: What type of functional group is present in the compound that has an IR stretch at 1700 cm^-1 and an NMR peak at 9 ppm in the ^1H NMR spectrum?
message_2: The IR stretch at 1700 cm^-1 is indicative of a carbonyl group (C=O) present in the compound. The 1H NMR peak at 9 ppm suggests that there is an aldehyde proton (CHO) in the compound. Therefore, the functional group present in the compound is an aldehyde (R-CHO).
